nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: a hoopstone ring or horseshoes pin
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want my own hoopstone ring or horseshoes pin, in case I get bored.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: a chess or Ur board, and a stool or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want my own game board, and somewhere to sit while I play. A stool, dining chair, or armchair are all acceptable.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: a billiards table
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want my own billiards table.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: poker table, and four dining chairs or better
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want to host my own poker games. A poker table and four dining chairs or armchairs.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: a TV, and a dining chair or armchair
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want my own TV. I'll settle for a tube television and a dining chair, but bigger is also better.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: a flatscreen tv, and an armchair
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want my own flatscreen TV, and a comfy armchair to watch it from.

nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.label: a megascreen tv, and three armchairs
nuff.PersonalizedBedrooms.RoomDesireDef.description: I want my own home theater. I'll settle for nothing short of a megascreen television, with three armchairs to watch from.
